thag4.1:5.1: Adorned with jewelry and all dressed up,
thag4.1:5.2: with garlands, and sandalwood makeup piled on,
thag4.1:5.3: along the main street is a lady—
thag4.1:5.4: a dancer dancing as the music plays.
thag4.1:6.2: and while walking along I glanced at her,
thag4.1:6.3: adorned with jewelry and all dressed up,
thag4.1:6.4: like a snare of death laid down.
thag4.1:8.2: see the excellence of the teaching!
